content.rendered:
Norwegian, is a Norwegian low-cost airline and Norway’s largest airline. It is the fourth largest low-cost carrier in Europe behind Wizz Air, easyJet and Ryanair, and is the largest airline in Scandinavia, and the ninth-largest airline in Europe in terms of passenger numbers.

 

 

Norwegian Airlines in Fornebu, Norway Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Diamanten,
Fornebu, Norway

Phone: +44 (0)330 828 0854
Denmark: +45 70 80 78 80
Finland: +358 (0)9 231 01 600
France: +33 (0) 97 07 38 001
Germany: +49 (800) 5895000
Italy: +39 06 94 80 2756
Norway: +47 21 49 00 15
Spain: + 34 900 868 518
Sweden: +46 (0)770 45 77 00
Other countries: +47 2149 00 15

Email: NA

Working hours: (all days – service in English)
08:00-20:00 CET

Norwegian Airlines Official website: https://www.norwegian.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Norwegian Airlines

Total fleet: 27

  • Boeing 737-800

Norwegian Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Norwegian Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Norwegian Airlines

Traveling with Pets in Norwegian Airlines

  • Only cats and dogs are allowed.

For more details: https://www.norwegian.com/uk/travel-info/baggage/travelling-with-pets/

Queries handled by Norwegian Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Norwegian Reward

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Norwegian Airlines in Fornebu, Norway Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Norwegian Airlines in Fornebu, Norway: (click on the stars below)
